ExampleCharacter.name: ExampleCharacter
ExampleCharacter.full_description: A tall human warrior with weathered features and a kind smile. Wears practical leather armor over a dark green tunic. Carries a longsword at their hip and a wooden shield on their back.

description_components.head_face: Weathered human face, strong jaw, kind brown eyes, short dark hair with grey at the temples, small scar on left cheek
description_components.body_build: Tall and muscular, broad shoulders, athletic build, mid-40s
description_components.armor_clothing: Practical brown leather armor, dark green tunic underneath, sturdy leather boots, worn leather gloves
description_components.accessories: Longsword in leather scabbard at hip, round wooden shield with iron boss on back, leather belt pouch
